Create a time-traveling journal that allows users to reflect on their past experiences and learn from them.
Develop a virtual reality app that simulates the feeling of regret and helps users understand its impact on their lives.
Create a personalized regret map that visualizes the user's past regrets and suggests ways to overcome them.
